name: Risky Traffic
description:
Risky traffic is an exciting endless race against time while trying to avoid traffic. Help your driver maneuver through traffic touching the Left and right sides of your screen the make the car move from side to side. You can find bonus repair tokens that can be use to repair your car, as well as money tokens that can be used to purchase other cars in the game.

Features

Endless play
8 Bit pixel game
Exciting and Fun Gameplay
